# Vue 3 + Vite + Tailwind + Daisy (Template)

```json
"devDependencies": {
"@vitejs/plugin-vue": "^5.0.4",
"autoprefixer": "^10.4.19",
"daisyui": "^4.12.2",
"postcss": "^8.4.38",
"tailwindcss": "^3.4.4",
"vite": "^5.2.0"
}
```

## Requirements

Node

```bash
https://nodejs.org/en
```

degit

```bash
npm install -g degit
```

## Download template

```bash
degit loc1263/vue-vite-tw-daisy-template my-new-vue-project
```

```bash
cd my-new-vue-project
```

```bash
npm install
```

```bash
npm run dev
```
